scripts.build:all: npm-run-all build:common build:flow build:ai build:plugins build:third_party build:dotprompt pack:all build:samples
scripts.build:common: cd common && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:flow: cd flow && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:ai: cd ai && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:dotprompt: cd dotprompt && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..; done
scripts.build:third_party: for i in third_party/*/; do cd $i && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..; done
scripts.build:samples: pwd && for i in samples/*/; do cd $i && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..; done
scripts.pack:all: mkdir ../dist || true && npm-run-all pack:common pack:flow pack:ai pack:dotprompt pack:plugins pack:third_party
scripts.pack:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && npm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist -ws && cd ../..; done
scripts.pack:third_party: for i in third_party/*/; do cd $i && npm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist -ws && cd ../..; done
